skills.hover: All work is pushed to GitHub repos using git cli
Always stay up to date with HTML5
How else will you use Flexbox without CSS3?
Plenty of Wordpress maintenance and I have made a couple themes.
Ruby- Still a begginer but its definitely grown on me.
Other languages I am less proficient in, such as JavaScript, PHP, and liquid.

showcase.title: Accomplishments Report
showcase.summary: The Accomplishment Report for Cincinnati Children's is a collection of articles and staff for each department.
showcase.details: Made with Ruby on Rails with HAML and Sass. I was responsible for building the main page and article pages. each component is made using flex and partials so we can use an admin system to dynamically serve each page.

showcase.title: Annual Protection
showcase.summary: Webpage for Mobil 1 Oil's new Annual Protection.
showcase.details: We used animations with scrollmagic to get a nice slide and fade effect. Built on Ruby on Rails with HAML and Sass.

showcase.title: illy Various Pages
showcase.details: Several corporate illy shop pages that are not readily avaialable to the public. These were all single pages for their Holiday guide, coffee origins and espresso comparisons.

showcase.title: Modster
showcase.details: A custom Wordpress theme I built for a fashion website called Modster.com. Written with PHP this is a fully functional Wordpress theme with Pages and partials.

showcase.title: Universal Package
showcase.details: Written in liquid with Shopify, Universal Package is a retail store that mainly sells containers.

showcase.title: Liberty Campus
showcase.summary: Website for Cincinnati Children's newer Liberty Campus.
showcase.details: Made with Ruby on Rails, I worked on the second 'sports Med' page where I took elements from the main page, turned them into partials and reapplied/reskinned them for a new purpose.
